steps.title: Install the SDK
steps.description: Install the package from your preferred package manager.

steps.title: Initialize the client
steps.description: Import and configure the client with your API key.
steps.notes: This creates a client instance that you'll use for all API calls.

steps.title: Make your first request
steps.description: Now you can start making API calls.
steps.notes: The response includes pagination data and the requested users.
